name: ValueSetR5TherapyRelationshipTypeForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.TherapyRelationshipType for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/therapy-relationship-type|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/therapy-relationship-type|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `ClinicalUseDefinition.contraindication.otherTherapy.relationshipType` as Preferred

Across FHIR versions, the value set has been mapped as:
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/therapy-relationship-type|5.0.0`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/therapy-relationship-type|4.3.0`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:
All concepts in the comparison are have code literals listed as identical.
The source value set has more active concepts (10) than the target (9), so the source is broader than the target.
